about_the_game:
What is Tel-AI-phone?

Tel-AI-phone is a hilarious twist on the classic telephone whispering game where you whisper a message down a line of people. Only now instead of whispering you pass images generated by AI.

Tel-AI-phone is the perfect game for a game night or family party. It also works great with friends hanging out on Discord.

How is the game played?
Launch the game and cast it to a screen that everyone can see. (Screen sharing via Discord works great too!)
Everyone goes to the link shown on the screen and enters the game code.
Once everyone is ready the game will start with everyone uploading a picture, this can be one you take in the moment or one from your library.
Everyone's photos are passed around the group, you then take turns trying to describe what you see to an AI that will then generate that description. That image will be passed to the next player.
After a few rounds of describing and generating, you'll have to try and match the final images to a description of the original image that nobody has seen.
Last, everyone votes on how well the images made the transformation.
At the very after the winner gets to bask in their superiority, you all have a chance to see the image progression. This is our favorite part of the whole game!
